name: Uakami Studio
tagline: Create awesome stuff for the digital world
description:
We specialize in solving communication problems through digital media (internet) and mobile devices.
We take our projects to the next level through new technologies and global standards to achieve innovative and high impact results.
We develop powerful, creative and easy-to-use websites, use state-of-the-art technologies and state-of-the-art design to create smart, modern sites.
